functions.name: setAUMID
functions.description: Sets the AUMID for the given window to the hostname

parameters.name: windowId
parameters.description: The window to set the AUMID for

parameters.name: siteId
parameters.description: The siteId will be used as the AUMID of the window

parameters.name: windowId
parameters.description: The window to set the icon for

parameters.name: siteId
parameters.description: The siteId is used for the name of the icon on disk

functions.name: createShortcut
functions.description: Creates a shortcut for the taskbar window

parameters.name: siteId
parameters.description: The siteId is used for the AUMID of the shortcut

parameters.name: windowId
parameters.description: The window to set the icon for

parameters.name: displayName
parameters.description: The tooltip of the shortcut on the taskbar

parameters.name: homepage
parameters.description: The page to open the browser to

parameters.name: pin
parameters.description: Whether the shortcut should be pinned to the taskbar when created

functions.name: deleteShortcut
functions.description: Deletes a shortcut for the taskbar window

parameters.name: siteId
parameters.description: The siteId of the site to delete the shortcut for

parameters.name: displayName
parameters.description: The displayName for the site, which is used as the filename of the shortcut

parameters.name: deleteIcon
parameters.description: Indicates whether or not to delete the icon as well

functions.name: copyPinexe
functions.description: Copies pin.exe to the profile path

functions.name: isPinned
functions.description: Determines if the site is pinned to the taskbar

parameters.name: siteId
parameters.description: The siteId for the site to check
